job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p><u>Software Engineer</u>&nbsp;required by a Healthcare start-up focused on home healthcare. Their goal is to combine service and modern technology in order to provide exceptional experiences for patients.</p><p><br></p><p>They are looking for a Software Engineer to join their team in NYC.</p><p><br></p><p><u>The role:</u></p><ul><li>3+years’ experience with Java or Python</li><li>Experience with AWS</li><li>Spring Boot</li></ul><p><br></p><p><u>Compensation:</u></p><ul><li>Up to $170,000 plus benefits and stock options</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><u>If this Software Engineer Positon could be of interest please apply through this advert, or send a copy of your Resume to C.Gregoire@x4technology.us</u></p>
